name: T. P. McGOVERN and Dorothy McGovern, his wife, Appellants, v. John J. SPEAR and Constance Spear, his wife

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., did riot participate in the decision of this case.
parties: T. P. McGOVERN and Dorothy McGovern, his wife, Appellants, v. John J. SPEAR and Constance Spear, his wife.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree of the Court of Common Pleas is affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
MANDERINO, J., did riot participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: T. P. McGovern, in pro. per.
casebody.head_matter:
409 A.2d 1363
T. P. McGOVERN and Dorothy McGovern, his wife, Appellants, v. John J. SPEAR and Constance Spear, his wife.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 9, 1979.
Decided Feb. 1, 1980.
T. P. McGovern, in pro. per.
No brief for appellees.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
